alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:15AM CDT until May 09 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wright County in central Minnesota... Meeker County in central Minnesota... Central Stearns County in central Minnesota... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 815 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Belgrade to 5 miles northwest of Atwater to 5 miles southwest of Dassel, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dassel around 820 AM CDT. Cokato and Paynesville around 825 AM CDT. Annandale around 835 AM CDT. Albany, Richmond and Watkins around 840 AM CDT. Cold Spring and Avon around 845 AM CDT. St. Joseph, Collegeville, Rockville and Holdingford around 850 AM CDT. Waite Park around 855 AM CDT. St. Cloud around 900 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Paynesville Airport, Fairhaven, Litchfield Airport, Spring Hill, Strout, South Haven, St Augusta, Pleasant Lake, St Nicholas and Smith Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
